known_issues: Intermittent error: "unable to load profile" occurs again when loading user profile.

existing_features.title: Fix the startup/auth flow so the app does not get stuck on a startup error when the current user profile fetch fails intermittently; the user must be able to retry successfully without a full page reload.

Make the current-user profile React Query hook resilient to transient errors by avoiding throwing 'Actor not available' from the profile query function, and by using a limited retry policy for network/transient failures while keeping the missing-profile case as a successful null result.

Improve diagnostics for profile-load failures without blocking valid flows: log the underlying error details in development and show a clear, user-facing English error message that distinguishes backend connection issues vs profile loading issues.

projectName: Fix intermittent “Unable to load profile” startup error
